title: Animals and Pets
sentences: ladra cuando alguien llama a la puerta.
My dog barks when someone knocks at the door.
duerme todo el día encima del sofá.
The cat sleeps all day on top of the sofa.
que canta muy bien por las mañanas.
I have a bird that sings very well in the mornings.
corre muy rápido por el campo.
The horse runs very fast through the field.
nos da leche fresca cada día.
The cow gives us fresh milk every day.
tienen mucha lana blanca y suave.
The sheep have a lot of white and soft wool.
en casa o prefieres un hámster?
Do you have a rabbit at home or do you prefer a hamster?
nada en la pecera del salón.
The fish swims in the fish tank in the living room.
camina muy lento por el jardín.
The turtle walks very slowly through the garden.
es el rey de la selva.
The lion is the king of the jungle.
tiene una nariz muy larga llamada trompa.
The elephant has a very long nose called a trunk.
grande en el rincón del techo.
There is a large spider in the corner of the ceiling.
vuela de flor en flor para hacer miel.
The bee flies from flower to flower to make honey.
I don't like snakes because they scare me.
salta de árbol en árbol en la selva.
The monkey jumps from tree to tree in the jungle.
pone un huevo todas las mañanas.
The hen lays an egg every morning.
vive en la granja y es muy inteligente.
The pig lives on the farm and is very intelligent.
tiene rayas negras en su cuerpo naranja.
The tiger has black stripes on its orange body.
en el zoo? Es muy alta.
Have you seen a giraffe at the zoo? It's very tall.
come un trozo de queso en la cocina.
The mouse eats a piece of cheese in the kitchen.
nada tranquilamente en el lago del parque.
The duck swims calmly in the park's lake.
vive en el bosque y aúlla a la luna.
The wolf lives in the forest and howls at the moon.
My dog has a very short and wiggly tail.
Dolphins are very intelligent marine animals.
The butterfly has wings of many colors.
